attributes.action: CANZUK: Seek free movement and free trade with Canada, Australia & New Zealand
attributes.additional_details: Canada, Australia, New Zealand and the United Kingdom are more than likely to succeed and prosper under mutual economic and social policies due to their similar socio-economic circumstances. The CANZUK nations share the same majority language, the same sovereign (Queen Elizabeth II), the same Westminster-style parliamentary system, the same common-law legal system, the same respect for democracy, human rights and the rule of law, and the same westernised culture.
attributes.background: A CANZUK agreement would allow free movement between each of the 4 countries, meaning law abiding citizens can live, work and study without a Visa. Free trade would also be a part of the deal and this will help build better business relationship with each country.
